name: Vanilla JavaScript
desc: Solid foundations of vanilla JavaScript, its newest additions (ES6,7,8,9), and modern workflow (Babel & Webpack).

name: React Ecosystem
desc: Adept at building intereactive, performant, and large-scale applications with React, its latest features (Hooks, Context...) and ecosystem (Redux, Gatsby...).

name: Full Stack with MERN
desc: Seasoned builder of fully functioning back-end REST/GraphQL API that can handle user authentication, CRUD operations, data filtering/sorting...

name: Serverless & the Cloud
desc: Familiar with Firebase Auth, Firestore, Functions, and Hosting. Long-time user of AWS, Google Cloud Engine, both for hosting and proxy tunneling.

name: Data Visualization
desc: Proficient maker of data-driven, interative, responsive, and real-time updating visualizations (graphs, charts, diagrams) with D3.js or Victory.js.

name: LA/NMP & Wordpress
desc: Customized, deployed and maintained: corporate websites w/ Wordpress, an Uni department forum w/ Discuz! and a polling app w/ LimeSurvey, all on LA/NMP.

name: CSS Styling
desc: Competent in vanilla CSS, frameworks (MaterialUI, Bootstrap...), CSS-in-JS with Styled Components or JSS, and the SASS extention.

name: Python Web Scraping
desc: Experienced with basic Python syntaxes and the Scrapy web crawling framework to scrape multi-layered information with media files attached into a structured database.
